TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AutoCompleteAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class AutoCompleteAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class AutoCompleteAttribute sealed : Attribute

Docs.summary: Marks the attributed method as an object. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If `AutoComplete` is specified, it must not be disabled in the COM+ catalog; if enabled in the COM+ catalog, it must be specified on the component.
The transaction automatically calls <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ContextUtil.SetComplete%2A> if the method call returns normally. If the method call throws an exception, the transaction is aborted.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.AutoCompleteAttribute> type.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Specifying a parameter value of `false` causes the `AutoComplete` attribute to be ignored.
